attributes.action: Build a new Cenotaph in Peterlee, Co Durham
attributes.additional_details:
After a fantastic day out with family and friends, taking our Saladin for a bit exercise on Sundays Remembrance Parade in Peterlee, I was heartbroken to see our Cenotaphs in the state it was in, I look at Horden, Seaham, Easington and feel why have we got the worst Cenotaphs, Please sign the petition and make a change
Thanks
attributes.background: Many veterans are heartbroken to see our Cenotaphs in the state it was in, We would like to start a petition in order to gather funds and permissions for a new one, to honour the soldiers who payed the ultimate sacrifice for this nation.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
